Summary: A light with a moving beam
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Gladstone
There were no other sightings in Gladstone on or around November 24th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I parked in my driveway facing East, I saw a lighted craft above the cloud cover over the moon, and I saw this light pretty close and it started to move away in a vector perpendicular to me. I didn't move until I bothered to grab my camera, it just kept moving away to the point where you see it in the picture. All the while this cone beam rotating haphazardly around the craft in no set pattern. Just weird.
